strings.name: Geographical Society
strings.extendedDescription: The Geographical Society, in the Department of Geography & Planning, Sherubtse College, Royal University of Bhutan, with support from the Center for Climate Change and Spatial Information, has made several efforts to create awareness and address important issues at the local and national level. We now join hands with the international student-centered YouthMappers network on "Mapping for Resilience" and contributing to a global 'Happiness'!
